Text: O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
Dago alaku unyi Jihofa, kʼe̩ fʼakoya o̩la-i ta, kakini, Me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa, ame̩ abo Juda chaka, kʼame̩ gudu lʼalaku-i nyʼadojikane̩ ñwu Jihofa.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, kakini, Me̩ ñw o̩na-me̩ kpai uko̩lo̩-me̩ che, tak u naje̩ ñwu me̩ dodo ugbo-i.
Me̩ ki ke̩do̩nʼo̩la olemi, kakini, Unyi Jihofa, unyi Jihofa, unyi Jihofa jo̩-i n.
Todu iche̩wñ ku me̩ ñw o̩na-me̩ kpai uko̩lo̩-me̩ che nyo̩nyo̩; kʼame̩ la che e̩wñ kʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa ka agbagba one̩ kpʼekeji-wñ;
kʼame̩ ma la fʼilowa kpai e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n kpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ te̩mane̩ n, ku me̩ ma la dʼe̩bie̩ ki ma nʼudu n dafo ugbo-i n, ku me̩ ma la alule̩ tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi ki chʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ñwu me̩ n;
e̩gba le̩ naje̩ ñwu me̩ dodo ugbo-i, oj ane̩ kʼu du ñw amata-me̩ kwʼigbegbele gbogbo alo.
Go, ame̩ ke̩do̩nʼo̩la olemi, ki ma neke nʼile ñwu me̩ n.
Ame̩ ajoji? ame̩ akpone̩? ame̩ ache̩ño̩ya? ame̩ ago̩ olemi? ame̩ agu otulale jo ñwu Beal? ku me̩ la alule̩ tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼame̩ ma ma ma mama ta n ubi?
tak ame̩ awa dago o̩gba-mi ef unyi ku ma dʼodu-mi mʼo̩-i, ku me̩ kakini, Ma mʼuwa gba me̩, kʼame̩ ki che e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-i du?
Unyi ki de̩ ku ma dʼodu mi mʼo̩ mud owo amadinya eju-me̩? Go, omi de̩, u fʼu li, Jihofa ka-i.
Me̩ hi muda nyʼuña-mi ki te̩te̩de̩ Shailo fai, owñ chʼugbo kʼu dʼodu-mi te̩ e̩gba ejodudu le̩, ku me̩ go e̩wñ kʼu chʼo todu e̩wñ bibi kʼamone̩-mi Israe̩l che.
Fai ge̩, todabu kʼame̩ fʼuko̩lo̩-i chaka che, Jihofa ka-i, kʼu la ko̩la ñwu me̩; kʼu takpa kwane̩ aka, me̩ muda gbo̩ n. U la do̩ me̩, me̩ muda je̩ n.
Todule̩ omi ache unyi ku ma du rʼodu-mi, e-kʼame̩ ke̩do̩no-i, kpai uña kʼu du ñwu me̩ kpʼamata-me̩, alu kʼu che Shailo le̩.
Oñ nako me̩ rikpolo bʼumi eju te̩, alu kʼu kʼamo̩maye-me̩ chaka rikpolo dufu le̩, owñ chʼo̩gbo̩ ugbe̩ Ifraim chaka.
Todule̩ e̩kichʼadua todu amone̩-i n, e̩ ki la chʼomu nyʼate̩, kʼe̩ la chadua todu ma n, e̩ ki la gbo̩ko̩bʼumi n; todu nagbo̩ e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka n.
E̩ li e̩wñ kʼama jʼache ewo ewo Juda, kpai ej o̩na ej o̩na Je̩rusale̩m-i n?
Abimo̩to̩ achʼiji wa, amata-ma la akʼuna, abobule̩ la afʼomu ku ma chʼakala ñw onu onobule̩ e-efojale, ku ma laño̩ dʼomi dafo ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩, kʼama ki bi mi eju.
Omi ma bi eju le̩? Jihofa ka-i. I chʼo̩la-ma kʼeju-ma ki ku e̩bo̩no̩ ma che n?

Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, ma adʼuwe̩do̩-mi kpʼe̩do̩fulu-mi danyʼuña kide̩, abʼoji one̩, kpai abʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, kpai oli oko du, kpai e̩ro ane̩pe̩te̩ ma; i la ajo waa, una-wñ la jʼakpalu n.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ka de̩ kakini, kʼe̩wñ e̩gujo ku me̩ ko wa le̩ manyʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩-me̩, kʼame̩ ki jʼe̩la.
Todu u ko̩la ñw amata-me̩ n, u la ñwa ñwu ma, o̩jo̩ kʼu ko ma kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu, o̩la e̩wñ ekowa gujo kpai iche̩bo̩ eche n.
E̩wñ kʼomi muda ñwa ñwu ma de̩ kakini, Netirʼomu-mi, tak omi achʼO̩jo̩-me̩, oñ ame̩ achʼamone̩-mi. Me̩ ki la lule̩ o̩na du kʼomi añwa ñwu me̩ kʼi ra ñwu me̩.
Ma la nyeti n, ma hi eti-ma wane̩ n, ma muda lule̩ lʼo̩na ibe e-ma ku ma kpe̩ ef e̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-ma ki bie̩ne̩ ñwa, taku ma lʼubiubi, ma le tʼo̩gba n.
Akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼamata-me̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa gbogbo wʼeñini-i, omi te̩takpʼamadu-mi amakache̩ chaka uche̩ rʼume̩; u takpa kwane̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa akpe̩ ma.
Ma muda netirʼumi n kpo̩, ma la hi eti-ma wane̩ n; ma fʼo̩lo̩-ma lo; ma che bie̩ne̩ tʼamata-ma le.
Uwe̩ ki la kʼo̩la-i du ñw ma; ma muda anetirʼuwe̩ n; uwe̩ ki ño̩ do̩ ma udo̩; ma muda aje̩ n.
Uwe̩ la aka ñw ma kakini, Uche̩ichi amone̩ kʼama ma netirʼomu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma n-i de̩; ma la agba uko̩-o̩la n: ubi one̩ eche lenyo̩, i la muko̩da bʼalu-ma te̩.
Fʼiloji-we̩ ja kʼe̩ mʼu ko rinyo̩;
Todu amo̩ma Juda fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ che eju-mi me̩, Jihofa ka-i; ma mʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma ko gugu ef unyi ku ma du rʼodu e-mi, ku ma fʼu daji.
Ma ño̩ fʼotete otete Tofe̩t du ge̩, owñ chʼe-ki dʼef o̩go̩ o̩ma Hino̩m, kʼama ki fʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ gujo ef una; omi la ñwʼe-le̩ ñw ma n, i la wʼef e̩do̩-mi n.
Todule̩, go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa ka-i, kʼama ñʼadʼo̩ ko̩ Tofe̩t ge̩ n, kpai o̩go̩ amo̩ma Hino̩m i n, chai O̩go̩ One̩ Ekpa: todu ma akʼoku one̩ ji Tofe̩t, gbogbo taku ma ñʼali uña ge̩ n.
Tak oku amone̩-i achʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩we̩ ojale, kpai tod ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ile̩-i; e̩ne̩ du la anyʼuma okpo kwʼo̩mo̩ n.
E̩gba le̩ naje̩ ñw omu anyi kpai omu e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ kpai omu o̩ko̩ etito̩ kpai omu o̩ya etito̩ ki muda bʼewo ewo Juda te̩, kpai kwo bʼo̩na o̩na Je̩ruaale̩m te̩; todu ane̩ le̩ amud alache̩ te̩.
